question_text: Which of the following should be true when installing a CPU? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Use no force when inserting the CPU
The CPU must match the socket type
Thermal paste must be applied after locking the CPU
The CPU can be installed in any direction
correct_answer: Use no force when inserting the CPU
The CPU must match the socket type
explanation: A CPU should drop into place when correctly aligned with the socket, and the socket type must match the CPU. It must also be oriented properly.
